
[console_scripts]
resumelb = zc.resumelb.lb:main
zkresumelb = zc.resumelb.zk:lbmain

get-lb-status = zc.resumelb.zk:get_lb_status
rlb-nagios = zc.resumelb.nagios:main

[paste.server_runner]
main = zc.resumelb.worker:server_runner
zk   = zc.resumelb.zk:worker
